data.name: Gamerzone
data.description:
Gamerzone (GMZ) is looking to change the perspective of societies and at the same time provided an enhance benefit to gamers worldwide. Video gamers have been a large and growing part of our culture for a long time. Whether you are playing consoles or PCs games or even mobile games on your lunch break, you are part of the gaming world. 

We are looking to change this stereotyping by creating communities that is not only for gaming but you can invest by holding the token and trade via our platforms for games NFTs, items and accesories that you may have pick up during the recent raid or grinding in your favourite game.
This will provide the gamers with the ability to earn while doing something they love. Platform readiness and collaboration with game developers will take place in Q4 2021. The initial target for the developers would be Indie game developers in order to integrate and fine tune  our trading platform with the game mechanics.
